entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 01:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over western sections. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm except 15 cm over western sections. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
